EmailTemplate.name: 4.5 Release webinar invite.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: You’re Invited: VMTurbo v4.5 Release Webinar
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
As virtualization inspired Software Defined architectures continue to spread across the datacenter, VMTurbo is there to drive and control them, improving performance and reducing costs throughout.
Join us as we unveil our new Fabric Control Module, extending our market leading approach to the control and management of the Cisco UCS platform, as well as the 4.5 revision to our flagship VMTurbo Operations Manager product and Storage Control Module.
Sign up now to our webinar, on Thursday, January 30th at either 8:00AM - 9:00AM EST (http://bit.ly/1eKySg2) or 12:00PM - 1:00PM EST (http://bit.ly/1gMwpBa) and learn first-hand from VMTurbo experts how to automate decision-making and bring control throughout your virtual datacenter.
Kind Regards, The VMTurbo Team
